Class MP3_Frame

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--MP3_Frame
public class MP3_Frame
extends java.lang.Object

Captures the information from the first MPEG frame in a file, if present.

Version:
2.0 - September 30, 1999
Author:
C. Vickery

Constructor Detail

MP3_Frame

public MP3_Frame(java.io.File f)
          throws Invalid_MPEG_FileException
Given a File, find the first MPEG frame, then extract and interpret the information encoded in the frame's header.
Parameters:
f - The file to be examined.
Throws:
Invalid_MPEG_FileException - if the MPEG header sync. pattern (11 binary 1s starting on a byte boundary) cannot be found.
